content: People have to talk about something just to keep their voice boxes in working order so they'll have good voice boxes in case there's ever anything really meaningful to say.
translations: ita:Le persone devono parlare di qualcosa solo per mantenere le loro laringi in grado di funzionare, in modo da avere in fut
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
